channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- After Effects
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- After Effects

item.title: CVE-2021-44194|2024-08-04T04:17:24.590Z -- adobe -- after%20effects
item.description: Adobe After Effects versions 22.0 (and earlier) and 18.4.2 (and earlier) are affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2021-40761|2024-08-04T02:51:07.416Z -- adobe -- after%20effects
item.description: Adobe After Effects version 18.4.1 (and earlier) is affected by a Null pointer dereference vulnerability when parsing a specially crafted file. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to achieve an application denial-of-service in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2021-40754|2024-08-04T02:51:06.905Z -- adobe -- after%20effects
item.description: Adobe After Effects version 18.4.1 (and earlier) is affected by a memory corruption vulnerability due to insecure handling of a malicious WAV file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. User interaction is required in that the victim must open a specially crafted file to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-44192|2024-08-04T04:17:24.433Z -- adobe -- after%20effects

item.title: CVE-2021-36018|2024-08-04T00:47:43.492Z -- adobe -- after%20effects
item.description: Adobe After Effects version 18.2.1 (and earlier) is affected by an Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability when parsing a specially crafted file. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to disclose sensitive memory information in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2021-40751|2024-08-04T02:51:07.042Z -- adobe -- after%20effects
item.description: Adobe After Effects version 18.4 (and earlier) is affected by a memory corruption vulnerability due to insecure handling of a malicious .m4a file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. User interaction is required in that the victim must open a specially crafted file to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-43755|2024-08-04T04:03:08.803Z -- adobe -- after%20effects
item.description: Adobe After Effects versions 22.0 (and earlier) and 18.4.2 (and earlier) are affected by an Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability due to insecure handling of a malicious file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-44188|2024-08-04T04:17:23.594Z -- adobe -- after%20effects
item.description: Adobe After Effects versions 22.0 (and earlier) and 18.4.2 (and earlier) are affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability which could result in a read past the end of an allocated memory structure. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
